descriptionHTML:
Watch face for smartwatches with:

- steps counter ( "Steps "A");
- second steps counter "Steps "B";
- switch steps/meters measurement;
- set the level of steps (goal) per day (if not using Google Fit);
- "Night mode" (with custom start/stop time);
- custom setup for Ambient mode with brightness text/icons and on/off indicators;
- battery level(watch/smartphone);
- missed Calls and SMS counters;
- smartphone status: Ringer (silent/vibro) and Connections (WiFi/Mobile data);
- launcher smartphone apps from smartwatch;
- built-in calendar;
- stopwatch with tachymeter;
- second time "Time2" (GMT timelines);
- selected backgrounds/colors.

Working fine on oldest and newest models on any screen (round/square).
Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Español
- Français
- Deutsch
- Nederlands
- Italiano
- Português
- Русский
- 日本の
- 中文 （繁體）


SHORT GUIDE

1. Double click on any area - open watch face menu
2. One click on Date number (on top) - open Calendar
3. One click on Steps-B counter - switch to Steps-A (amount counter) and next one click switch back to Steps-B counter.
4. Stopwatch/tachymeter - see instruction on screenshot image.


TERMS

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.

Warning: watch face ONLY FOR ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.

Paid version continually crashes Paid version will continually crash.  Only version that works is the free one.  The look of the watch face is awesome on the screen shots wish I could use the app.  Please refund or fix the app.
I'm having the same issue It says it's stopped. Not working. Please refund. The non pro version works fine. Update still not working. Free version works.

Love the faces but.... After installing every time I tried to open/configure it I got "unfortunately clock master pro has stopped"? If you get this fixed, I'll come back and buy it. Zenwatch 2.   Thx. Jim.....2/27 Paid/downloaded,same problem? But, this time I didn't get a refund.....?
Crashes. I get no errors on setup.  Just crashes on my moto 360.
recentChanges: - new function "Phone state" info (Vibro mode, WiFi/Data connection);
- additional functions for the steps counter (goals, steps to meters) and new section in Configuration app: "WALK";
